author: ehatcher
msg: Refactoring of server deployment task.  Renamed from <ejbdeploy> to <serverdeploy>.  Moved to new j2ee package so its not EJB-centric. Submitted by Christopher A. Longo - cal@cloud9.net

author: jskeet
msg: Fixed up JavaDocs so they build without errors. The main changes were:
o Capitalisation. Please capitalise the first word of a new sentence, otherwise break-iterator complains.
o @created tags. These aren't valid JavaDoc, and the info is in CVS anyway...
